title: A New Novel Conjures Liv Ullmann and Ingmar Bergman
description: A. O. Scott talks about Linn Ullmann’s “Unquiet,” and Judith Newman discusses new books about anxiety, mental illness and grief.
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
